titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I arranged with the Sacrist for the issue of a monthly list of Celebrants. It is an experiment, the success of which would solve a practical problem. M

Wilkinson (née Fogg–Elliot) lunched here – a pretty young woman with a quaint little stutter. I walked with Logic, making a resolute effort thus to shake off an obstinate chill, which now expressed itself in a futile & unhelpful cough.
